title: Ancient African bedrock reveals violent beginnings of life on our blue planet
description: Ancient rocks in South Africa and Eswatini act like a geological time machine, revealing oceans, volcanoes and microbial life thriving more than 3.5 billion years ago.
content: You have probably seen the images of the surface of Mars, beamed back by NASA’s rovers. What if there were a time machine capable of roaming Earth during its remote geological past, perhaps even goin… [+4588 chars]
de: Uraltes afrikanisches Grundgestein enthüllt gewalttätige Anfänge des Lebens auf unserem blauen Planeten. Uralte Gesteine ​​in Südafrika und Eswatini wirken wie eine geologische Zeitmaschine und offenbaren Ozeane, Vulkane und mikrobielles Leben, das vor mehr als 3,5 Milliarden Jahren gedieh.
en: Ancient African bedrock reveals violent beginnings of life on our blue planet. Ancient rocks in South Africa and Eswatini act like a geological time machine, revealing oceans, volcanoes and microbial life thriving more than 3.5 billion years ago.
la: Vetus Afer petram violenta initia vitae nostrae in planeta caeruleo revelat. Saxa antiqua in Africa Australi et Eswatini tamquam machina temporis geologica agunt, revelans maria, vulcanorum et microbialium vitam plus quam 3.5 miliardis annos vigens.

title: What’s inside Mexico’s Popocatépetl? Scientists obtain first 3D images of the whole volcano
description: Scientists now know where the magma accumulates.
content:
By MARÍA VERZA
POPOCATÉPETL VOLCANO, Mexico (AP) In the predawn darkness, a team of scientists climbs the slope of Mexicos Popocatépetl volcano, one of the worlds most active and whose eruption coul… [+8245 chars]
de: Was ist im mexikanischen Popocatépetl enthalten? Wissenschaftler erhalten erste 3D-Bilder des gesamten Vulkans. Wissenschaftler wissen jetzt, wo sich das Magma ansammelt.
en: What’s inside Mexico’s Popocatépetl? Scientists obtain first 3D images of the whole volcano. Scientists now know where the magma accumulates.
la: Quid intus est Popocatépetl Mexicum? Physici primum obtinent 3D imagines totius vulcani. Scientes nunc sciunt ubi magma accumulat.

title: Albay health office declares Code White Alert amid Mayon Volcano Alert Level 3 status
description: The Albay Provincial Health Office has declared a Code White Alert effective Tuesday, January 6, 2026 hours after Mayon Volcano Alert Level was raised.
content:
The Albay Provincial Health Office has declared a Code White Alert effective Tuesday, January 6, 2026 hours after Mayon Volcano Alert Level was raised.
The announcement was made after DOST-PHIVOLCS … [+892 chars]
de: Das Gesundheitsamt von Albay erklärt den Code-White-Alarm inmitten der Mayon-Vulkan-Alarmstufe 3. Das Gesundheitsamt der Provinz Albay hat am Dienstag, dem 6. Januar 2026, Stunden nach der Anhebung der Alarmstufe für den Vulkan Mayon, einen „Code White Alert“ ausgerufen.
en: Albay health office declares Code White Alert amid Mayon Volcano Alert Level 3 status. The Albay Provincial Health Office has declared a Code White Alert effective Tuesday, January 6, 2026 hours after Mayon Volcano Alert Level was raised.
la: Albay officium sanitatis declarat Code White erecti inter Mayon Volcano erecti gradu 3 status. Officium sanitatis provincialis Albay declaravit Codicem Albae erecti efficax die Martis, ante diem 6 mensis Ianuarii, anno 2026 horarum post Mayon Volcano erecti gradu evectus est.

title: Volcano guides at Mount Etna are protesting over new safety rules
description: Guides who take tourists to enjoy the striking views of Sicily’s Mount Etna are up in arms over tougher restrictions imposed by local authorities after a round of eruptions at the giant volcano in recent weeks
content: MOUNT ETNA, Italy -- Guides who take tourists to enjoy the striking views of Sicilys Mount Etna are up in arms over tougher restrictions imposed by local authorities after a round of eruptions at the… [+2859 chars]
de: Vulkanführer am Ätna protestieren gegen neue Sicherheitsregeln. Reiseführer, die Touristen mitnehmen, um die atemberaubende Aussicht auf den Ätna auf Sizilien zu genießen, sind empört über strengere Beschränkungen, die die örtlichen Behörden nach einer Reihe von Ausbrüchen des riesigen Vulkans in den letzten Wochen verhängt haben
en: Volcano guides at Mount Etna are protesting over new safety rules. Guides who take tourists to enjoy the striking views of Sicily’s Mount Etna are up in arms over tougher restrictions imposed by local authorities after a round of eruptions at the giant volcano in recent weeks
la: Duces Volcano apud montem Aetnam protestantur nova praecepta salutis. Duces qui peregrinatores delectant sententias de Monte Etna Siciliae in armis sunt de durioribus restrictionibus ab auctoritatibus localibus impositas post circum eruptiones in volcano giganteo proximis hebdomadibus
